info.name: NPM Dark Theme - Complete
info.description: This is a modified version of NPM Dark Theme, adapted to cover the entire site as well as improve a few other aspects of the theme.

data.title: Some fixes, and just to look it yet a little better :) Code should be optimized btw, only example.
